name: Heroku PG Dump
description: Dumps your postgres database and pushes it to S3.

PGHOST.description: The host address of the Postgres database

PGUSER.description: The user of the Postgres database

PGDATABASE.description: The name of the Postgres database

PGPORT.description: The port number of the Postgres database

ENVIRONMENT.description: The environment that the database runs in e.g. staging, production etc

AWS_BUCKET.description: The name of the S3 bucket in which to put the dump file

SLACK_URL.description: The slack webhook url with a `token` parameter

SLACK_USERNAME.description: The username of the bot that will post the message to Slack

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The Slack channel in which to post the message
